title: I need Advice (Aurelion Sol)
body: Hello guys ! It's Image again. I was wondering if there is anybody out there who can give me tips on how to lane against Orianna as Aurelion Sol. The playstyle I ussually run with is, farm for the first 3 waves then back afterwards. Then repeat for clearing waves while trying to add slight pressure to Orianna. Afterwards I would roam if I hard pushed my lane and try to help my teammates. The problem I have with Orianna is that even though we go stale in lane she always out damages me. If anyone has any itemization set against Orianna I would like to hear it, so far I have tried megatron Cloak as a early mitigation of damage. Thank you for reading :)

replies.body:
[According to LoG](http://www.leagueofgraphs.com/champions/counters/aurelionsol) Aussie winrate improves against Orianna.

Try to push and roam because that seems to be an advantage he has over her.  

Also, why are you backing after only 3 waves?
That's probably something you need to fix sooner rather than later.  Don't use your W wastefully.

roam 
get gold
out damage her (once shot w-q-r) 
she wont be a problem
you win gam

That sounds good on paper, but that applies if your teammates are paying attention to your roam. Thank you though. Also The potential to out damage her is cut when she has the chance to ult you, your w resets and you're basically sitting duck for a good 3-4 seconds.
Laning against ori as a low-range champ is basically a shitshow. All you can really do is try to roam and snowball other lanes when she backs or is busy.
Don't bother playing Sol. Play some braindead champ like LB or Syndra, and just delete her. Thrice the effect, a fraction of the effort.
